name: MAKEOUT CLUB Soft Blur Lipstick
about: What it is: A soft-blur lipstick delivering depth and color with a buildable matte finish...Formulation Type: Lipstick..Benefits: Hydrating, Long-wearing..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Royal Orchid Extract: Reinforces and protects lip.- Magnolia Bark Extract: Anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.- Vegan Lanolin Substitute: Provides seamless adhesion and moisturizing properties..Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A buildable, medium-to-full coverage lipstick with a soft-matte, transfer-proof, feather-free finish. This nourishing formula features Royal Orchid Extract to reinforce and hydrate lips, Magnolia Bark Extract rich in antioxidants and vegan lanolin for a cushioned feel....
ingredients: -Royal Orchid Extract: Protects lips. .-Magnolia Bark Extract: Adds antioxidant and soothing benefits. .-Vegan Lanolin Substitute: Provides seamless adhesion and moisture. ..Dimethicone, Isononyl Isononanoate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyethylene, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Silica, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Orchid Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Aroma (Flavor), Dicalcium Phosphate, Methicone, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citral, Citronellol.  May Contain/Peut Contenir: (+/-) Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491/Ci 77492/Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply directly to lips and blend with fingers along edges for a blurred look..-Build opacity by layering up.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful shades mainly for warmer tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried Baddie, Muse, Main Character, and now The Moment. I love the formula really badly, because it goes on smoothly and it glides perfectly, leaves a really nice matte finish that doesn't feel dry, and overall it's just a great lipstick. As a fair, cool skin tone leaning neutral, here is what I'm thinking of these colors. This is obviously a line for generally warmer and darker skin tones, and they look amazing, so this will only serve a few people but here it is.  Baddie was definitely browner than I think, with no hint of pink on me. It looked also darker, so I couldn't go for it, but obviously a beautiful shade otherwise.  Muse was a bit orangey, and just didn't work. I noticed that I'm a very cool tone when it comes to lipstick because anything remotely warm will look orange on me (if you're like me, you know), so that had to be a pass. A beautiful pink otherwise if your skin tone can take it.  Main Character I actually kept! It's the perfect blend of brownish pink mauvey that doesn't lean warm, and again, the formula made me so happy I could keep one of them. Very moody and mature, love it.  And so I tried The Moment recently. Again, a beautiful nude pink but also a bit orangey, so sadly I have just been completely unable to find any nude color that works on me, because they are all too warm overall. I will just say, it looks much more nude than pink in person in my opinion, I expected something much more on the pink (and blueish) side, so keep that in mind and ideally swatch swatch swatch at the Sephora store! (if they have your shade in display of course)

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Freck Beauty Lip Blur and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. It glides onto the lips effortlessly, providing a comfortable and hydrating feel. I love that it doesn't dry out my lips like some other lip products tend to do.The color payoff is fantastic. The Lip Blur provides a beautiful, natural-looking tint to the lips that enhances my natural lip color. It's perfect for those days when I want a subtle, effortless look. Not only can it be used as a lip tint, but it can also be used as a blush or even an eyeshadow. I love products that have multiple uses, and the Lip Blur definitely delivers in that aspect.It stays put for hours without fading or smudging, which is a huge plus for me. I don't have to worry about constantly reapplying throughout the day.

reviews.review_text: I've made a lot of mistakes with lipstick in the past - my liquid matte lipstick phase, for example, which I still own hundreds of dollars worth of evidence of. I wouldn't say it's INCREDIBLY long lasting, but it does work pretty hard considering how much I talk and drink coffee all day. I also find that it fades out in a really lovely way. I bought another shade too which I'll probably try out tomorrow. Love the formula though. Between this and cheek slime, Freck is a brand I'd all but disregarded until recently and am now pleasantly surprised with. The pigmentation is definitely there, but in a way that you can do a small swipe and then blot it out, or lay it on thicker. I prefer the former.

reviews.review_text: I was on a quest to find the perfect orange fall lip color, and boy does this fit the bill. I am OBSESSED with this color. It also helps the color last longer. I'd say the consistency is slightly creamier than the Charlotte Tilbury lip cheat lip liner. A few things to note:   - Color does transfer. Not a deal breaker for me, but yes. Your Starbucks lid will let everyone know.  - I hate the packaging. It feels cheap and doesn't keep the product in place while you're applying it. Be careful when opening and closing the lid, I feel like the entire stick could overextend and break off easily. - Reapplication is super easy. It's enough to dab it in the middle of your lips and rub. It has a really natural finish that doesn't fade awkwardly like some bright lip colors. - Since it's really matte, I enjoy wearing a lip oil over top of this product to give it a bit of hydration and shine. It looks fantastic either way.

The texture feels so soft and smooth and my lips feel hydrated. No tight or dry feeling at all. The color is nicely pigmented, is buildable and does not bleed. It feels lightweight on my lips. I highly recommend this lipstick.
